resources.string: This application will show you how a FridgeTag works. Click the ">" button to continue.

string-array.name: custom_tags_instructions
string-array.item: There are 2 buttons on the FridgeTag - a Set and Read button
The Alarm state will show either "OK" or "ALARM" based on the current status of the FridgeTag
The Time/Alarm Duration displays the current time, or the amount of time the since the temperature has exceeded one of the limits
The Temp/Min-Max shows the current temperature of the FridgeTag
The alarm icons indicate how long ago a cold/hot alarm was registered. Use the scale at the top to determine what day they occurred. ▲ indicates a high alarm; ▼ indicates a low alarm
You have now completed the FridgeTag overview. Press > to continue
